<small>Also see: **<big>[[H6188|עָרֵל]]</big>**</small>

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעַל‎</span>] **verb** ==quiver, shake, reel== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְעַל‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***quiver, shake, tremble***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***the hanging part*** of a sheep's split ear, also ([[BDB#Frey|Frey]]) a kind of ***veil*** of which a part hangs down in front; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dangling***; Lihyanian has proper name <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעל‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Epigr. Denkm.</sup> Arabic 38); — 

**Hoph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבְּרשְׁים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָרְעָ֑לוּ‎</span> [[Nah.2.4|Nah 2:4]] ***are made to quiver.*** See also [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרַל‎</span>].
